thread.title: Hotel Review
thread.title_full: Hotel Review - Review of Paramount Hotel Times Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Joshua R
title: Hotel Review
text:
Paramount Hotel it was such such a nice place to stay on a cold winter day you see the hotel and it had that home feeling, it has a little shop inside what sells soft drinks to a different variety of snacks.
The rooms are very spacious and comes with a nice sized
Tv and really decent view and a heater/cooler.
The Bathroom was really nice the baths are deep and got plenty of room.
The bar and restaurant we didn't really visit.
Location - 30 Seconds away from Times Square and is in such a nice perfect area. A little market on the corner and broadway is right infront of you.
Subways - They're litterally everywhere
Tours - The Big New York bus Tour I would highly recommend using this company they have the following tours:
DOWNTOWN
UPTOWN
BROOKLYN
DOWNTOWN AND BROOKLYN NIGHT TOUR
My favourite was between Downtown and Brooklyn and The Funniest one was Downtown and Brooklyn Night Tour (Bernie is fantastic and you'll be very happy if you have him)
We used these buses as general transport!
I would highly recommend buying the New York Passes saves you so much money you get:
The Big New York Bus Tour
Empire State
Rockerfeller Centre
Ground Zero
Liberty Island
Ellis Island
Madame Tusards
And so much more...
I can't wait for my next visit and definitely will be staying in the paramount,
